LanguageData.Kurin_Overhead_Winter_Hat.description: A simple winter hat. Even in the cold, this makes it easy to spend winter.
LanguageData.Kurin_Overhead_Summer_Hat.description: A simple summer hat. Even on a very hot summer day, you can walk around with this hat.
LanguageData.Kurin_Overhead_Casual_Hair_Pin.descripti: It is a casual hairpin. Simply wearing it will make you feel energetic.
LanguageData.Kurin_Overhead_Goggles.description: Combat goggles. Provides minimal defense, but helps firing weapons.
LanguageData.Kurin_Overhead_Bikini_Armor_Headgear.des: Bikini armored crown. It's much stronger than it looks, and helps the wearer significantly in melee combat.
LanguageData.Kurin_Overhead_Military_Helmet.descripti: Combat helmet with a plasteel bulletproof shell. Protects from bullets, and helps the shooter see their target.
